alert.note: Alert for Brown; Martin; Redwood; Watonwan; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 14 at 12:18AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Minnesota, southwest Minnesota and west central Minnesota, including the following counties, in south central Minnesota, Brown, Martin and Watonwan. In southwest Minnesota, Redwood. In west central Minnesota, Yellow Medicine. * WHEN...Until 1 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Extensive street flooding is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Moderate to occasional heavy rain will continue through the morning. An additional 1 to 2 inches on top of the 2 to 5 inches that have fallen in the last 24 hours could lead to flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Martin; Redwood; Watonwan; Yellow Medicine
